Headline: The travel life of a die hard Northwestern fan
Article_Body: Go Cats! The author (left) and her friend, Julie King, can't keep it in at the Rose Bowl on New Year's Day, 1996. Let's tailgate: Superfan Andrew Hilsberg with the author at a tailgate before Northwestern beat Wisconsin in 2003. Remember the Alamo: Erin Collier (right) comforts the author during a crushing loss to Missouri at the 2008 Alamo Bowl in San Antonio, TX. Away game: Northwestern alumnus David Chalian, CNN Political Director, and the author take in a "Cardiac Cats" victory, this time over Nebraska in Lincoln, November 2011. Happy NU Year: The sign-holding author appeared on ESPN2 during the 2013 Gator Bowl in Jacksonville, FL, when Northwestern finally won their first bowl game in 64 years. Purple pride: Peter Dangerfield and the author snag a pic with Northwestern mascot Willy the Wildcat at the 2016 Pinstripe Bowl, held in New York City's Yankee Stadium. Victory dance: Katie Cour (left), Peter Dangerfield and the author celebrating Northwestern's win at the 2017 Music City Bowl in Nashville, TN. Mad world: Ryan Hedges (left) and Andrew Hilsberg with the author at Northwestern's first appearance at March Madness, Salt Lake City, 2017.
